name: Notable server
description: Stores and digest emails notes sent from Slack via the /notable slash command

SLACK_TOKEN.description: This token will be generated for you when you add the Slash Command in your Slack account

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: A Slack API token for your account

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: The Slack channel in which you'd like your notables to appear

MANDRILL_API_KEY.description: A Mandrill API key, used to send out the daily digest emails

TO_EMAIL.description: The email address you want the digests sent to

FROM_EMAIL.description: The email address you want the digests sent from

FROM_NAME.description: The name you want displayed in the digest emails
